data.name: labelEmployee.Help
data.value: Select an employee to display in this module.

data.name: labelShowCurrentUser.Help
data.value: If checked, module will try to display employee record, associated with current userid querystring param. If no employee record exist, module hides ifself. Consider enabling this setting with "Auto Title" enabled and "Data Cache Duration" set to 0.

data.name: labelAutoTitle.Help
data.value: If checked, module title will be set to employee name.

data.name: labelPhotoWidth.Help
data.value: Enter photo width in pixels, or leave empty to use original photo size.

data.name: labelDataCacheInfo.Text
data.value:
Important note about module caching:
This module uses its own custom data cache, so it is recommended to disable module cache on a "Page Settings" tab, and then set appropriate cache duration (in seconds) in a "Data Cache Duration" field below. Note what data cache is not implemented yet for R7.University.EmployeeDetails module.

data.name: labelDataCacheTime.Help
data.value: Enter data cache duration in seconds. Leave empty or set to 0 to disable module data cache.
